## getVersion()



#### Parameters

none

#### Return

* `string` OpenTX version (ie "2.1.5")

* `list` (available since OpenTX 2.1.7) returns two values:
 * `string` OpenTX version (ie "2.1.5")
 * `string` radio version (ie "Taranis", "TaranisPlus", if running in simulator the "-simu" is added)



---
Returns OpenTX version
